name: WEN BG625V 2.5-Amp 6-Inch Variable Speed Bench Grinder with Flexible Work Light , Black
short_description: 2.5-amp variable speed motor goes anywhere from 2000 to 3400 RPM
Perfect for reviving old tools, knives, bits and more
Flexible work light illuminates your project during operation
Includes one 80-grit wheel, one 36-grit wheel, pivoting tool rests, and adjustable eye guards
Backed by a two-year warranty
product_description: Remember when you spent all that money replacing dull, rusty tools? It’s time to get your grind on with the WEN 6-Inch Variable Speed Bench Grinder. From deburring ragged edges to cleaning objects to sharpening blades, this bench grinder helps resuscitate old, worn-down knives, tools, and bits, saving you time and money. Our package includes two 6-inch by 3/4-inch wheels with 1/2-inch arbors: an 80-grit wheel for general purpose grinding and a coarse 36-grit wheel for faster material removal. With our quiet 2.5-amp variable speed motor, expect quick startups and smooth performance at speeds anywhere from 2000 to 3400 rotations per minute. Built with you in mind, our design makes wheel guard removal as simple as possible for easy wheel changes. The included flexible work light illuminates your workpiece during operation. Adjustable work rests pivot to allow for angled grinding applications. And because it’s a WEN product, your 6-inch variable speed bench grinder comes backed by a two-year warranty, a stocked inventory of replacement parts, and a friendly customer phone line. No need to waste any more money on new knives and blades. The WEN 6-Inch Bench Grinder revives all of your tools, bringing them back to their original, sharp state. Remember when your blades could actually cut through something? Remember WEN.
product_details: EU Spare Part Availability Duration ‎2 Years
Included Components ‎2.5-Amp 6-Inch Variable Speed Bench Grinder with Flexible Work Light

name: 6-Inch Variable Speed Bench Grinder with Grinding Wheel Dresser, 1725–3450 RPM 2.5 Amp Brushless Induction Motor, LED Work Light, Eye Shields, Cast-Iron Base for Sharpening, Grinding & Polishing
short_description: 【Powerful Brushless Motor — Bench Grinder Performance】The 2.5A brushless induction motor delivers steady torque, quieter operation, and long-lasting durability—making this 6-inch variable speed bench grinder ideal for sharpening, grinding, polishing, and general workshop or DIY tasks.

【Wide Variable Speed (1725–3450 RPM) — For Sharpening, Grinding & Metalwork】 Easily dial in the right speed for any material. This variable speed bench grinder includes 36-grit and 60-grit grinding wheels (1/2" arbor), offering the control needed for coarse grinding, shaping, knife sharpening, and precision finishing.

【User-Friendly Adjustments — Designed for DIY & Workshop Use】 Tool-free adjustable guides, a stable work rest, a water tray for cooling metal, and dual safety switches make this bench grinder 6 inch easy and safe to use for repeated sharpening, grinding, and polishing jobs.

【Bright & Safe Work Area — LED Bench Grinder Light】 Adjustable eye and spark shields help protect against debris, while the built-in LED work light keeps your grinding surface clearly visible. Ideal for detailed metalworking, polishing, and accurate sharpening tasks.

【Solid Cast-Iron Construction — Stable Bench Grinder Base】 The heavy cast-iron base with anti-vibration rubber feet minimizes wobble for consistent grinding performance. Includes a diamond wheel dresser to maintain wheel shape and keep your bench grinder operating at peak efficiency.
product_details: Included Components ‎6" Variable Speed Bench Grinder, A Diamond Dresser

short_description: High-Speed Grinding: This 6-inch bench grinder is powered by a robust 250W, 2.1A induction motor that runs at 3450 RPM high speed. It delivers stronger grinding power, stable operation, and greater durability compared to standard motors, handling various grinding tasks efficiently

Efficient Grinding Wheels: Our single speed table grinder includes 2 durable brown fused alumina wheels: the 36-grit wheel for fast material removal and the 60-grit wheel for fine, precision grinding. Ideal for sharpening knives, blades, chisels, axes, and more — ideal for DIYers and mechanics

Thoughtful Designs: Our bench grinder features a built-in LED work light to illuminate the work area for more precise grinding. And the tool rest can be adjusted without tools, allowing flexible angles for smoother, more accurate results

Enhanced Stability: The cast iron body and steel plate base reduce wobble, enhance durability and stability for precise operation. Rubber feet further minimize vibrations, providing a more stable grinding experience

From deburring ragged edges to cleaning objects to sharpening blades, the WEN 8-Inch Bench Grinder helps resuscitate old worn down knives, tools, and bits, saving you time and money. Our package includes two 8-inch by 1-inch wheels with 5/8-inch arbors: a 60-grit wheel for general purpose grinding and a coarse 36-grit wheel for faster material removal. With our quiet 4.8-amp motor, expect quick startups and smooth performance at speeds of up to 3450 rotations per minute. name: BUCKTOOL 8 Inch 3/4 HP Low-Speed Bench Grinder & 180 Grit 8 Inch CBN Grinding Wheel, 1.5" Wide, 5/8" Arbor Cubic Boron Nitride Sharpening Wheel
short_description: Powerful 1750RPM low-speed induction motor, Rating power 3/4Hp; Peak power 1-1/4Hp, easy to drive CBN wheel

Extra wide 1-1/2 Inch first-class WA grinding wheel(can work with 1-1/2 inch CBN wheel), best for carpenters, turners, carvers; Left 8" x 1" x 5/8"(shaft) 80 grit, right 8" x 1-1/2" x 5/8"(shaft）120 grit
Super 3Watts LED with individual switch, great for detail sharpen

Superior Material Quality: The CBN grinding wheel boasts a hardness that surpasses that of regular abrasives, providing stronger and sharper cutting ability. When compared to diamond grinding wheels, it holds a distinct advantage in processing ferrous metals.

Zero Maintenance: Thanks to the high wear resistance of the Cubic Boron Nitride coated wheel, the shape of the grinding wheel remains stable during use. This means it can be used for extended periods without the need for frequent adjustments to the fixture.
product_description: BUCKTOOL 8 Inch 3/4 HP Low-Speed Bench Grinder & 180 Grit 8 Inch CBN Grinding Wheel, 1.5" Wide, 5/8" Arbor Cubic Boron Nitride Sharpening Wheel
